title: Dispose of Obsolete Inventory
description: A product has been discontinued for years, and the remaining obsolete inventory needs to be disposed of.

tasks.description: Run a report to identify all inventory with no sales activity in the last two years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of obsolete stock.

tasks.description: Create a disposal order for the obsolete items.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal order to dispose of the goods is created.

tasks.description: Adjust the inventory records to write off the disposed stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adjusts the inventory quantity to zero, recording it as a write-off.
